cdcx_50_v1_btc.name: CDCX 50 Bot V1 - Bitcoin
cdcx_50_v1_btc.description: Advanced multi-indicator strategy combining Supertrend, MACD, Bollinger Bands, RSI, and MFI for Bitcoin futures trading. This sophisticated algorithm uses dynamic ATR-based stop losses and take profits, with intelligent position sizing based on market volatility. The strategy incorporates advanced risk management techniques including trailing stops, breakeven protection, and maximum daily loss limits.
cdcx_50_v1_btc.detailedDescription: The CDCX 50 Bot V1 employs a comprehensive approach to Bitcoin futures trading by analyzing multiple technical indicators simultaneously. The core strategy uses Supertrend to identify market direction, while MACD histogram confirms momentum changes. Bollinger Bands provide volatility-based entry signals, and RSI/MFI filters help avoid overextended market conditions. The system includes advanced features like correlation analysis with traditional markets, news sentiment integration, and adaptive position sizing based on recent market volatility.
cdcx_50_v1_btc.author: CoinDCX Quant Team

backtestResults.disclaimerText: Following results are backtested results on historical data. These historical simulations do not represent actual trading and have not been executed in the live market.

cdcx_50_v1_eth.name: ETH Trending Strategy by Sahil with good win rate
cdcx_50_v1_eth.description: Ethereum-optimized version of the CDCX 50 strategy with enhanced volatility filters and position sizing for ETH futures trading. Backtest results on 100 USD capital (5% INR margin).
cdcx_50_v1_eth.detailedDescription: ETH strategy specifically designed for Ethereum's unique price action patterns and market dynamics. The algorithm analyzes ETH's correlation with DeFi tokens, gas price trends, and network activity to optimize entry and exit points. Advanced volatility filtering ensures trades are only taken during optimal market conditions.
cdcx_50_v1_eth.author: Sahil Kumar

backtestResults.disclaimerText: Following results are backtested results on historical data. These historical simulations do not represent actual trading and have not been executed in the live market.

momentum_breakout_v2.name: Momentum Breakout V2
momentum_breakout_v2.description: High-performance momentum breakout strategy using volume-weighted price action, RSI divergence detection, and dynamic support/resistance levels.
momentum_breakout_v2.detailedDescription: The Momentum Breakout V2 strategy capitalizes on significant price movements by identifying breakout patterns with strong volume confirmation. The system analyzes volume-weighted price action to filter false breakouts and uses RSI divergence detection to spot potential reversals before they occur. Dynamic support and resistance levels are calculated in real-time based on recent price action and volume clusters, providing more accurate entry and exit points than static levels.
momentum_breakout_v2.author: Alpha Trading Labs

backtestResults.disclaimerText: Following results are backtested results on historical data. These historical simulations do not represent actual trading and have not been executed in the live market.

scalping_master_pro.name: Scalping Master Pro
scalping_master_pro.description: Ultra-fast scalping strategy for 1-minute timeframes using orderbook analysis, tick-by-tick price action, and micro-trend detection.
scalping_master_pro.detailedDescription: Scalping Master Pro is designed for ultra-high-frequency trading on 1-minute charts, utilizing advanced orderbook analysis and level 2 market data. The system monitors tick-by-tick price movements and identifies micro-trends that last only minutes. By analyzing order flow imbalances and detecting institutional activity, the strategy can predict short-term price movements with remarkable accuracy. The risk management system uses micro stop-losses and quick exit mechanisms to minimize exposure time.
scalping_master_pro.author: SpeedTrade Systems

backtestResults.disclaimerText: Following results are backtested results on historical data. These historical simulations do not represent actual trading and have not been executed in the live market.

swing_trend_hunter.name: Swing Trend Hunter
swing_trend_hunter.description: Long-term swing trading strategy identifying major trend reversals using multiple timeframe analysis and institutional flow indicators.
swing_trend_hunter.detailedDescription: Swing Trend Hunter specializes in capturing significant price movements over days or weeks by analyzing multiple timeframe confluences. The strategy monitors institutional flow patterns, smart money movements, and volume delta to identify high-probability swing trade setups. Advanced multi-timeframe analysis ensures entries at optimal levels with wide stop losses and pyramid exit strategies to maximize profits from trending moves.
swing_trend_hunter.author: Institutional Signals

backtestResults.disclaimerText: Following results are backtested results on historical data. These historical simulations do not represent actual trading and have not been executed in the live market.

mean_reversion_delta.name: Mean Reversion Delta
mean_reversion_delta.description: Statistical arbitrage strategy exploiting mean reversion patterns in crypto pairs using Z-score analysis and correlation matrices.
mean_reversion_delta.detailedDescription: Mean Reversion Delta employs sophisticated statistical models to identify overbought and oversold conditions in cryptocurrency pairs. The strategy uses Z-score analysis to measure how far prices have deviated from their historical mean, combined with correlation matrices to identify pairs trading opportunities. Linear regression channels and Bollinger Bands provide additional confirmation for entry and exit signals.
mean_reversion_delta.author: Quant Research Ltd

backtestResults.disclaimerText: Following results are backtested results on historical data. These historical simulations do not represent actual trading and have not been executed in the live market.

grid_trading_adaptive.name: Grid Trading Adaptive
grid_trading_adaptive.description: Dynamic grid trading system that adapts to market volatility with intelligent spacing and position sizing for sideways markets.
grid_trading_adaptive.detailedDescription: Grid Trading Adaptive employs a sophisticated algorithmic approach to capitalize on ranging market conditions. The system automatically adjusts grid spacing based on ATR volatility measurements and implements dynamic position sizing to optimize capital efficiency. Advanced features include trend detection filters to pause trading during strong trends, automatic grid rebalancing, and intelligent profit taking mechanisms.
grid_trading_adaptive.author: GridBot Technologies

backtestResults.disclaimerText: Following results are backtested results on historical data. These historical simulations do not represent actual trading and have not been executed in the live market.

options_delta_hedge.name: Options Delta Hedge
options_delta_hedge.description: Advanced options delta-neutral strategy using sophisticated Greeks analysis and dynamic hedging for consistent returns.
options_delta_hedge.detailedDescription: Options Delta Hedge employs cutting-edge quantitative models to maintain market-neutral positions through continuous delta hedging. The strategy leverages implied volatility surfaces, Greeks calculations (Delta, Gamma, Theta, Vega), and sophisticated risk management to generate alpha from volatility trading while minimizing directional exposure. Advanced features include volatility smile modeling and cross-asset hedging.
options_delta_hedge.author: Options Analytics Pro

backtestResults.disclaimerText: Following results are backtested results on historical data. These historical simulations do not represent actual trading and have not been executed in the live market.

news_sentiment_alpha.name: News Sentiment Alpha
news_sentiment_alpha.description: AI-powered sentiment analysis strategy combining real-time news processing, social media sentiment, and market microstructure for alpha generation.
news_sentiment_alpha.detailedDescription: News Sentiment Alpha utilizes advanced natural language processing and machine learning to analyze real-time news feeds, social media sentiment, and market data. The strategy employs transformer-based models to process news sentiment scores, combines them with traditional technical indicators, and executes trades based on sentiment-momentum convergence patterns. Features include multi-source data fusion and adaptive sentiment thresholds.
news_sentiment_alpha.author: Sentiment Analytics Lab

backtestResults.disclaimerText: Following results are backtested results on historical data. These historical simulations do not represent actual trading and have not been executed in the live market.

arbitrage_triangular.name: Arbitrage Triangular
arbitrage_triangular.description: High-frequency triangular arbitrage strategy exploiting price inefficiencies across multiple cryptocurrency pairs with microsecond execution.
arbitrage_triangular.detailedDescription: Arbitrage Triangular employs sophisticated algorithms to identify and exploit triangular arbitrage opportunities across multiple cryptocurrency exchanges and trading pairs. The strategy continuously monitors price relationships between three currencies (e.g., BTC/USDT, ETH/BTC, ETH/USDT) to identify profitable arbitrage loops. Features include ultra-low latency execution, cross-exchange arbitrage, and automated position sizing based on available liquidity.
arbitrage_triangular.author: HFT Arbitrage Systems

backtestResults.disclaimerText: Following results are backtested results on historical data. These historical simulations do not represent actual trading and have not been executed in the live market.

volatility_surface_trade.name: Volatility Surface Trade
volatility_surface_trade.description: Advanced volatility trading strategy using 3D volatility surface modeling and options flow analysis for institutional-grade execution.
volatility_surface_trade.detailedDescription: Volatility Surface Trade employs sophisticated quantitative models to analyze and trade volatility across multiple strike prices and expiration dates. The strategy constructs real-time volatility surfaces using Black-Scholes-Merton models, identifies mispriced options, and executes complex volatility trades including straddles, strangles, and calendar spreads. Advanced features include volatility clustering analysis and cross-asset volatility correlation modeling.
volatility_surface_trade.author: Volatility Research Institute

machine_learning_lstm.name: Machine Learning LSTM
machine_learning_lstm.description: Advanced deep learning strategy using LSTM neural networks and reinforcement learning for adaptive market prediction and execution.
machine_learning_lstm.detailedDescription: Machine Learning LSTM employs cutting-edge deep learning architectures including Long Short-Term Memory networks, convolutional neural networks, and reinforcement learning agents. The strategy processes multi-dimensional market data including price, volume, orderbook, and sentiment to generate probabilistic forecasts. Features include online learning adaptation, ensemble modeling, and adversarial training for robust performance across different market regimes.
machine_learning_lstm.author: AI Trading Labs
